name: All Types of Cancer
description: This is not a cancer type by itself but to represent every type of cancer out there.

name: Brain and Other Nervous System
description: Cancer type related and developed in the brain and other related nervous system.

name: Colon and Rectum
description: A cancer of the colon or rectum which may begin as noncancerous polyps.

name: Esophagus
description: Cancer of the tube that runs from the throat to the stomach (esophagus)

name: Hodgkin Lymphoma
description: Cancer of the part of the immune system called the lymphatic system

name: Stomach
description: Cancer that occurs in the stomach
